items.title: How to compile?
items.body:
Hi!

I'm trying to build JadeSpectrogram on Linux.
cloned it, then:

`cmake -B cmake-build -DCMAKE_PREFIX_PATH=/usr/lib64/juce` i have JUCE system-wide installed
then:
`cmake --build cmake-build/  -j8`
and got a bunch of linking errors:
```
[ 54%] Linking CXX shared module AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/VST3/JadeSpectrogram.vst3/Contents/x86_64-linux/JadeSpectrogram.so
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor()':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x70d): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::PresetHandler()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x86d): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::setAudioValueTreeState(juce::AudioProcessorValueTreeState*)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x882): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::loadfromFileAllUserPresets()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::prepareToPlay(double, int)':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0xc10): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::preparetoProcess(int, int)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::processBlock(juce::AudioBuffer<float>&, ju
ce::MidiBuffer&)':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0xf1a): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::processBlock(juce::AudioBuffer<float>&, juce::MidiBuffer&)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::~Spectrogram()':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text._ZN11SpectrogramD2Ev[_ZN11SpectrogramD5Ev]+0x3e): undefined reference to `spectrum::~spectrum()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor()':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x70d): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::PresetHandler()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x86d): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::setAudioValueTreeState(juce::AudioProcessorValueTreeState*)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0x882): undefined reference to `PresetHandler::loadfromFileAllUserPresets()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::prepareToPlay(double, int)':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0xc10): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::preparetoProcess(int, int)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor::processBlock(juce::AudioBuffer<float>&, ju
ce::MidiBuffer&)':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text+0xf1a): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::processBlock(juce::AudioBuffer<float>&, juce::MidiBuffer&)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginProcessor.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::~Spectrogram()':
PluginProcessor.cpp:(.text._ZN11SpectrogramD2Ev[_ZN11SpectrogramD5Ev]+0x3e): undefined reference to `spectrum::~spectrum()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(Spectrogram.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::Spectrogram()':

Spectrogram.cpp:(.text+0x1376): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::setDesiredBlockSizeSamples(int)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(Spectrogram.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::setclosestFFTSize_ms(float)':

/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(Spectrogram.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::buildmem()':
Spectrogram.cpp:(.text+0x1620): undefined reference to `spectrum::setFFTSize(int)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginEditor.cpp.o): in function `JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessorEditor::JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessorEditor(JadeSpectrogramAudioProcessor&)':
PluginEditor.cpp:(.text+0x57a): undefined reference to `JadeLookAndFeel::JadeLookAndFeel()'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginEditor.cpp:(.text+0x5a9): undefined reference to `PresetComponent::PresetComponent(PresetHandler&)'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginEditor.cpp.o): in function `JadeLookAndFeel::~JadeLookAndFeel()':
PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0xf): undefined reference to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0x21): undefined reference to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0x37): undefined reference to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0x4d): undefined reference to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0x63): undefined reference to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginEditor.cpp.o):PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD2Ev[_ZN15JadeLookAndFeelD5Ev]+0x79): more undefined references to `vtable for JadeLookAndFeel' follow
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(PluginEditor.cpp.o): in function `PresetComponent::~PresetComponent()':
PluginEditor.cpp:(.text._ZN15PresetComponentD2Ev[_ZN15PresetComponentD5Ev]+0x10): undefined reference to `vtable for PresetComponent'
/usr/lib64/gcc/x86_64-suse-linux/11/../../../../x86_64-suse-linux/bin/ld: AudioPluginJadeSpectrogram_artefacts/libJadeSpectrogram_SharedCode.a(Spectrogram.cpp.o): in function `Spectrogram::Spectrogram()':
Spectrogram.cpp:(.text+0x54d): undefined reference to `SynchronBlockProcessor::SynchronBlockProcessor()'
```
